name: ITSQUIRMS
description:
Something is moving around in your house, but you aren’t sure what it is. Press space when it lands on the “X” to stop it in its tracks, preparing it for exorcism. Act fast, or else you might not survive the night! 

This is a group project for IMS 314 created by Jackson Clayton, Jason Allen, Gianni Dimacchia, and Ben Attina
